beforeAll.sql: CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE AEDTEJE USING com.databricks.spark.csv OPTIONS (path "${basePath}AEDTEJE.csv", header "true", inferSchema "false")
CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE HE1_MX_CAT_ENT_FINAN_DRO USING com.databricks.spark.csv OPTIONS (path "${basePathDomain}HE1_MX_CAT_ENT_FINAN_DRO.csv", header "true", inferSchema "false")

source.sql: Select base.*, ref.COD_ENT REFERENCED_COD_ENT from AEDTEJE_standardized_and_validated base left outer join HE1_MX_CAT_ENT_FINAN_DRO ref on (base.COD_ENT = ref.COD_ENT and base.FCH_CORTE_DATOS = ref.FCH_CORTE_DATOS and base.NUM_VER_PROC = ref.NUM_VER_PROC)
